content:
Although this PR is blocked by three other PRs, I met a confusing problem:
The CI of #20913 have passed, and the only difference between the two is a new file Mathlib.RingTheory.FilteredAlgebra.FilteredRingHom, but MathlibTest.Category.ConcreteCatrgory.ProfiniteGrp got some timeout solving isDefEq, which is definitely unrelated to what we add. Is this only caused by the growing size of mathlib or there are some other hidden reason? Can any one help?
